text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] on 2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">12 SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] and <style="highlight">1 [Curse] on 2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

text.name: Bygone Days
text.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">15 SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume <style="highlight">3 [Sinking] Count on target, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potency on target (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] and 1 [Curse] on <style="highlight">3 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

passiveList.name: If I Could Go Back...
passiveList.desc:
After Attack: If the target is defeated after this unit's attack, gain 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource.
Gain 1 additional E.G.O resource for every 5 ([Sinking] Potency + Count) (max 3)
(If there are 2 or more "least-owned E.G.O resource", select 1 of those Affinities at random to gain an E.G.O resource)

coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [AzureTakeDamageUp]. At 3+ Gloom Reson., inflict 1 additional [AzureTakeDamageUp]

text.desc:

Targets randomly
